data: {"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/sGssyV8kuJqBAeQdQRmazo5VY9E.jpg","belongs_to_collection":null,"budget":25000000,"genres":[{"id":35,"name":"Comedy"},{"id":18,"name":"Drama"}],"homepage":"","id":9903,"imdb_id":"tt0462338","origin_country":["US"],"original_language":"en","original_title":"The Hoax","overview":"In what would cause a fantastic media frenzy, Clifford Irving sells his bogus biography of Howard Hughes to a premiere publishing house in the early 1970s.","popularity":15.009,"poster_path":"/jfHmDucGU4RCuwdXmKIj4MbG7qp.jpg","production_companies":[{"id":2448,"logo_path":null,"name":"Yari Film Group","origin_country":""},{"id":14,"logo_path":"/m6AHu84oZQxvq7n1rsvMNJIAsMu.png","name":"Miramax","origin_country":"US"},{"id":1557,"logo_path":"/ccz9bqCu3jSFKbPFnfWmjAKZLBL.png","name":"The Mark Gordon Company","origin_country":"US"},{"id":12260,"logo_path":null,"name":"Bob Yari Productions","origin_country":""}],"production_countries":[{"iso_3166_1":"US","name":"United States of America"}],"release_date":"2006-10-14","revenue":11772461,"runtime":116,"spoken_languages":[{"english_name":"English","iso_639_1":"en","name":"English"}],"status":"Released","tagline":"Never let the truth get in the way of a good story.","title":"The Hoax","video":false,"vote_average":6.254,"vote_count":203}
